VSCode Coding Tracker ReportBeta

Welcome to report page

This is report page of vscode coding tracker, you can get your coding activity report in this page.

Intro:

Watching time
The time you watching in the VS Code (include coding time)
Coding time
The time you typing in the VS Code (On the other hand, it reflects how long you focus coding)

Tips:

Click or hover on the chart
Hover for detailed info. Click project bar for detailed report of a project
Change languages
Select languages in the top of page nearby icon: Include: Russian, 中文(简/繁)

Contribution:

If you have any good idea or find any bug in this project. Please post issues or give me pull request
I welcome translations to this page into other languages. And solve the language expression fault in the page.
(About translating, you can refer chapter "Contributing" in this project README.md )
You can reopen this welcome information by clicking "welcome info" in the bottom of page.
